!Hierarch Kekropus: Yes. However, Inspectors are not the only ones adept at manipulating soul energy. The Kamael Nostra -- a genius born of time and chaos -- was the most skilled of all of us at manipulating soul energy. He realized that the skills of the 3 Heroes were fundamentally incompatible, and that only those who possessed certain predispositions could laern them. Accordingly, he established the skill system we now use, three patterns of development for male and female. [Quest _061_LawEnforcement kekrops_q0061_08.htm|"Tell me more about him."]
